net.trajano.ms.engine.jaxrs

Class JaxRsRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.ms.engine.jaxrs.JaxRsRouter

  • @Component
public class JaxRsRouter
extends Object
    This will take the JAX-RS annotated classes and create individual routes on a VertX router.

      • getHttpMethod

        private io.vertx.core.http.HttpMethod getHttpMethod(Method m)
        Gets the HttpMethod based on the annotation associated with the method. Only GET, POST, PUT, DELETE are supported.
        Parameters:
        m - method
        Returns:
        HttpMethod

      • register

        public void register(Class<? extends javax.ws.rs.core.Application> applicationClass,
                     io.vertx.ext.web.Router router,
                     PathsProvider pathsProvider,
                     io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext> jaxRsHandler)
        Register the routes.
        Parameters:
        applicationClass - application class to get the root
        router - router to apply the changes to
        pathsProvider - provides a list of Path classes
        jaxRsHandler - route handler
